link.title: City Academy
link.script:

hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Wednesday April 15, 2020

The Governor has now extended the soft closure of all schools through the end of the school year. Coping with this decision is hard and makes us sad in the moment. Sad to not see each other again in-person at school, sad for some of our families who have been suffering personal hardships from this closure, and sad for our seniors and their anticipated graduation ceremony.

Please know that while our buildings are closed, we are very much open and at work. I met virtually with the parents, students, and teachers of our City Academy Advisory Council (CAAC) yesterday afternoon and plans are already underway for a unique alternate graduation ceremony. We have very creative and resilient students and parents.

As you know, we also have very dedicated and innovative teachers and staff who, as one CAAC parent described it last night, “were so impressive to flip the switch so quickly, and have done such a great job with keeping learning going, with accommodating different students, and with communication.” Another parent pointed out that in her opinion, “City Academy has done a much better job than some of the schools her friends’ children attend.”

We will be back at school, and sooner than it seems now. Your school leadership team and staff have been very busy, not only supporting each of you as we work from a distance this spring, but also in preparing for reopening the school in August.
We are very excited for the more personalized, flexible and even more interesting and wider learning options in our city that will be available to all of you for next fall.

Please schedule your appointment with Mr. Olsen or Mr. Orr soon, if you haven’t already, to make a plan that addresses your personal goals, provides an optimal daily schedule for you, and creates your best educational opportunities for next fall.
Thank you all for your personal resilience during this time. I am grateful that we are alone together.
Please do not hesitate to reach out to our teachers or any of our staff if you need a little support with something. Meals remain available through the school districts.
Sincerely, Dr. Woodbury

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: FALL 2020

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Even while our school building is closed, we are actively registering students for next fall.

p.style: margin-left: 52px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: · New personalized course choices

p.style: margin-left: 52px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: · New flexible schedule

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Real-world learning,

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Dedicated teachers,

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Tuition-free charter school,

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: $4,000 college scholarship for every student.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: An engaging, personally meaningful education in an inclusive and welcoming diverse school community.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Please contact us now for more information and to enroll:

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: SPRING 2020 – 4

sup.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 10.799999999999999px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Quarter

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: We remain on soft closure through Friday May 1 – students and teachers will continue working remotely during that time through Canvas. Meals remain available through the school districts.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Students and Parents,

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

sup.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 10.799999999999999px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: quarter will begin as scheduled on Tuesday, March 31.

p.style: margin-left: 48px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: · Log into Canvas each day and engage with your posted classwork for each class.

p.style: margin-left: 48px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: · Set a schedule and routine for making daily learning progress.

p.style: margin-left: 48px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: · Make your best effort each day to submit assigned pieces of work as they are due.

p.style: margin-left: 48px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: · Communicate with your teachers whenever you need support.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: March 24, 2020

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: The Governor has now announced continuation of the "soft closure" of all public schools until May 1. Our students and teachers will not be coming back to classes at school until at least May 1. We will have more specific information for you about 4th quarter plans by March 31. In general, we will continue with the distance learning supported by Canvas that we were using during the week prior to our current spring break. Meals remain available through the school districts.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: In the meantime:

p.style: margin-left: 24px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: 1. Make your family’s well-being a priority.

p.style: margin-left: 48px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: · Wash your hands, get plenty of exercise, get plenty of rest, eat healthy, enjoy each other.

p.style: margin-left: 48px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: · Find those strategies, foods, activities, interactions, and quiet spaces that best help you and others relieve anxiety we are all experiencing.

p.style: margin-left: 24px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: 2. Perseverance and Patience. We are unaccustomed to doing so much distance learning. At City Academy we pride ourselves in the worth of every day at school as a chance to learn with and from each other and especially with and from our committed teachers. That opportunity hasn’t gone, it has just become very different and a bit strained with technology in the middle.

p.style: margin-left: 48px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: · Your teachers are an inspiration – they have jumped right in and begun providing tasks and lessons and videos and whatever they can think of that will help their students continue to think analytically and creatively, and learn.

p.style: margin-left: 48px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: · Make pursuing your curiosity and doing your best learning each day a continuing priority. Be patient with this different style of teaching and learning while we must use it.

p.style: margin-left: 48px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: · Take advantage of this opportunity to work more with technology. The trying and failing and trying again with distance learning is a part of our learning right now. Be patient with your teachers as they are learning this too.

p.style: margin-left: 24px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: 3. Resilience and Reward

p.style: margin-left: 48px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: · Stay with your daily learning progress after spring break. Taking some continuing time off is tempting, but don’t do it. Log into Canvas each day and engage with your posted classwork.

p.style: margin-left: 48px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: · Set a schedule so that you know when you will be studying – and when you won’t.

p.style: margin-left: 48px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: · At City Academy we are a learning community. Utilize the various forms of communication available to us via technology to ask questions, get support, give support, and submit work.

p.style: margin-left: 48px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: · We will sense the reward when we feel smarter and accomplished as we eventually are able to gather together again.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: Friday March 20, 2020

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: It is the 20

sup.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 10.799999999999999px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: of the month and we are not together at school, but I hope you each will take a moment to recognize City Academy’s 20 years of great education and school community. I sincerely hope we will all be able to gather again by our planned Art Share on May 20.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: We have seen a good number of you at school coming in to check out chrome books or other supplies. We are very pleased with the high percentage of students and parents who are communicating with your teachers and who are using Canvas to continue your school education. It is great to “see” all of you online. Your teachers will communicate after spring break about anything further needed to wrap up 3rd quarter.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: Please make sure to check the following Meals link as needed to get the most up to date information regarding meals and other emergency supplies available during this time. If you are not near or in the Salt Lake City School District, please make sure to connect with your neighborhood school or district so they can guide you to where help will be available.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: Thank you to Mr. Hunter, Mr. Olsen, Mr. Orr, Ms. Boteju, Ms. Padilla, Ms. McCamey who have been part of our skeleton crew at school this week. A big thank you to all the students and teachers who have worked remotely. You have been so resilient through all that has happened this week and just carried on with teaching and learning. Little did we know that our earlier production of All Shook Up was a premonition of things to come this year.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: City Academy is now officially on Spring Break through March 27.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: In the meantime, please stay healthy and safe. Follow any guidelines given by the Governor or Health Department, and watch for a new update from us on Monday March 30.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: Sincerely, Dr. Woodbury

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: We hope all our families are safe and healthy. If you need anything please communicate with us via email or text. We will not be at school today but are still planning to be at school Thursday and Friday if all is well following the earthquake this morning.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: Students still have access to their work and teachers through email and Canvas. Please check your text messages and email for updates.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Monday March 16, 2020

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: We remain on soft closure this week. All of our teachers and staff were in school today collaborating so that we can provide students with good learning opportunities this week. As we all know, technology is not a replacement for the active and interesting learning you value in City Academy classes with your teachers. We appreciate everyone’s best efforts to continue their learning progress until we can gather again. Stay healthy and smart!

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: As we go forward this week, please do the following:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Students should monitor their emails several times a day all week to get class updates on assignments and expectations.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: There will be a skeleton staff at City Academy 9:00-1:00 all week. We are available to help students if the need arises. Teachers will be mostly working remotely. Part of what we will all be learning this week is about the use of technology for communication and learning.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

li.p: Chrome books are available for checkout from 9:30-12:00 each day Tuesday through Friday this week.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: All school districts are ensuring that meal service is available to students in their areas. Starting Tuesday the SLCSD will provide grab-n-go breakfast and lunches for all children 0-18, including City Academy students at 20 school sites in Salt Lake City. Please check the helpful website

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: for information about meals for students and where to pick up your sack meal if you live within Salt Lake City school district boundaries. If you are not in the Salt Lake District, or cannot travel to the listed schools, please check the website for your local district to see where and when they will be serving their meals.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Any students in a credit recovery class should take good advantage of this time. Mr. Olsen will be continually monitoring your progress this week.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Please plan to enjoy our normal spring break March 23-27. Plan to monitor your emails and our website at the end of that break for further information

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: This is an ever-evolving process as you know. We will be communicating with you regularly as we have updated information.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Parents, please check your emails and text messages from the school regularly.
